tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Meenakshi madam has been continuously guiding us in her best possible way. Always recommendable. Thank you, Madam.
She was very friendly and open minded doctor who was also very non judgemental and patient.I would highly recommend her to every girl of this modern era

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
context: PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Menstrual Disorders in Adolescent Girls,Stomach Cramps,
review: Writing this Story as a Husband from my Mother's ID.We visited Dr.Meenakshi 2 weeks back for prolonged stomach pain for my wife. Since it was during lockdown, doctor first asked for our problems in Phone inorder to avoid unnecessary travel due to COVID season. She gave initial diagnosis in phone and told to take us scans and she didn't charge for the initial diagnosis also she told that she will examine in person only if there is a real necessity. But since we need to meet the doctor after results we contacted and went to meet her. She was examining well and took really good time to explain the issue and gave lot of advice with less medicine to treat my wife. We were completely satisfied and i recommend Dr.Meenakshi for those who looking for the friend who can treat not as a Doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Extremely grateful to Dr. Meenakshi for taking care of my pregnancy. She is a cordial personality with great smile who spent enough time with me, addressing my concerns and clearing all my questions in each and every visit. She was available over the calls and whatsapp in times of critical needs. As how others have reviewed, she is available to her patients literally 24*7 and gives us the assurance to reach her even in the midnight in case of any urgency. She is on time to her clinic and we never had to wait longer than 15 minutes to meet her. Her support staff, Ms. Ragi is also very helpful and a friendly girl! Thanks to the doctor for having a beautiful clinic in Adyar so that we dont have to go to a hospital for consultation, especially given the covid times when we are hesitant to visit hospitals! Her clinic is also equipped with basic amenities and equipment because of which we don't have to visit other centers for getting certain basic tests done! A couple of times, when I couldn't make it in person to her clinic, she was kind enough to extend online consultation for me. With respect to her treatment modality, she is a cool doctor *** ******* *** *** ***** *********** *********** sets practical expectations, boosts our self confidence and courage to handle the challenges. I am just happy that it was Dr. Meenakshi who safely brought my baby girl into this world! She is an ammmazing doc and would recommend her any day for anyone!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ***.She listens to us with patience and clarifies our doubts Gives the best possible solution for our problems. Speaks motivatingly.Doesn't recommend unnecessary meds or tests. Rare to see such a person nowadays. Her staffs were also very polite. Totally it was a great experience. I will definitely recommend to my friends and relatives.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is a great doctor. The most adorable, friendly, patient, simple, comfortable doctor i have ever met. With her guidance and support i am blessed with a girl child through normal delivery. Really a highly recommended doctor. She would be my gynec always and my daughter's future gynec. My all time favorite doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Gynae Problems,
review: Dr.Meenakshi is a very friendly approachable doctor that keeps time and treats her patients well. Very professional *** **** ************** Have consulted with her twice and she's been extremely helpful and doesn't prescribe meds without a need which I love. Definitely recommend.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Dr. Meenakshi is kind and friendly, and was able to explain my health issues to me immediately, while also offering solutions. I recommend her highly! She is the first gynaecologist I have ever visited and while I was nervous about my experience, she made it easy. Thank you, doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a minor issue so she examined and said there was no need for medication. Liked that the appointment was fixed for 11am and she was there on time.

Doctor was late by 30mins and said she didn’t expect traffic in chennai at 7pm. She said she had to drive down just for this one appointment and she is a gynaecologist and we work on emergencies. That was concerning as gynaecologists should be on time and she should have respected my time as I respected hers. Being informed doctor would be late would have saved my day too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very glad that such doctors are available in service industry.  She transfers positive vibes to the patient. Not making them panic. Very calm and peace way of handling and make the patient and their family to understand the health status. Thank you so much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She created a safe space for me to share information and her crystal clear explanations clarified my questions and put me at ease. I was very apprehensive and she calmed me down and assured me that there was nothing to worry about. She was able to listen to me and respect my apprehensions. I am extremely grateful to doctor for making my first gynaecological appointment smooth and worry-free.
